attributes.action: have drains, manhole covers or similar painted in bright colours or have them fitted with road services so that motorcyclists can either see them better in the dark to avoid crashing in the rain or a not slip surface covering for better grip in the wet at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many motorcyclists are often caught off guard in the wet road conditions from man hole, drains or similar maintenance covers usually at night and especially when wet. It makes sense to make them more visible and less dangerous to 2 wheeled users
